Uses of Class
com.cerner.bunsen.codes.ConceptMaps

  • Packages that use ConceptMaps 
    Package Description
    com.cerner.bunsen.codes
    Classes for working with FHIR concept maps.
    com.cerner.bunsen.codes.broadcast
    Support to broadcast code mappings that are useful to query or transform FHIR data in Spark.

    • Uses of ConceptMaps in com.cerner.bunsen.codes

      Methods in com.cerner.bunsen.codes that return ConceptMaps 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.getDefault(org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession spark)
      Returns the collection of concept maps from the default database and tables.
      static ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.getEmpty(org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession spark)
      Returns an empty ConceptMaps instance.
      static ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.getFromDatabase(org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession spark, String databaseName)
      Returns the collection of concept maps from the tables in the given database.
      ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.withConceptMaps(org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.ConceptMap... conceptMap)
      Returns a new ConceptMaps instance that includes the given map.
      ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.withConceptMaps(org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.ConceptMap> conceptMaps)
      Returns a new ConceptMaps instance that includes the given maps.
      ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.withConceptMaps(List<org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.ConceptMap> conceptMaps)
      Returns a new ConceptMaps instance that includes the given maps.
      ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.withDisjointMapsFromDirectory(String path)
      Returns all concept maps that are disjoint with concept maps stored in the default database and adds them to our collection.
      ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.withDisjointMapsFromDirectory(String path, String database)
      Returns all concept maps that are disjoint with concept maps stored in the default database and adds them to our collection.
      ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.withExpandedMap(org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.ConceptMap conceptMap, org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<Mapping> mappings)
      Returns a new ConceptMaps instance that includes the given map and expanded mappings.
      ConceptMaps ConceptMaps.withMapsFromDirectory(String path)
      Reads all concept maps from a given directory and adds them to our collection.
